item.title: Wifi and Zigbee Channels
item.description: Changing Zigbee channel (placeholder) Please redo, move, or update this wiki page with relevant information but don’t delete it, as it provides some good information. WiFi and Zigbee channels ¶Reference chart of overlapping Zigbee and WiFi channels: Channel 16, 17 and 18 can get interference from subcarrier and are better avoided. ZigBee and WiFi Coexistence further describes the interference between WiFi and Zigbee channels. The “default” primary Zigbee Light Link channels are 11, 15, 20 and 25.
